++ Directed Logic

DL is logic that has [Directness] and are predictable.

These technologies are examples of DL:
    * [Hooking]
    * [Watch]
    * [Notifying]
    * [Passthrough]
    * ContinuousInitialization - SpecificTarget
    * ChangeSensitivity
    * Bindings

DL is assigned by [Triggers].

These do not:
    * Using time to judge when tasks are finished rather than wait for reply or signal
    * [Polling]
